attributes.action: To have the Justice secatary disclose why Jon Venables has been returned to prison.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I beleive that it is in the public interest to find out why Jon Venables has been returned to prison.
Was he danger to the public and moreso was he a danger to children.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
